event.$description: Shorthand event string this donation is for.

_id.$description: Unique donation ID from the database.

donor_visiblename.$description: The name of the donor that they would like to appear as publicly (can be (Anonymous)).

amount.$description: The amount this donation is for. Currency isn't specified but is (currently) USD.

comment_state.$description: If the donation comment was accepted/rejected. Should be APPROVED or DENIED, rarely could be something else if something server side messes up; treat anything that isn't APPROVED as if it was DENIED.

comment.$description: Donator's comment. Can be blank; is made blank if their comment was rejected.

time_received.$description: Time stamp of when the donation was received.
